title: Chapter 2902: Chapter 1530: Failing To Steal A Chicken Only To Lose The Rice, Casually Knocking Into The Dragon Melting Realm_3
body:
Chapter 2902: Chapter 1530: Failing To Steal A Chicken Only To Lose The Rice, Casually Knocking Into The Dragon Melting Realm_3

Chapter 2902: Chapter 1530: Failing to Steal a Chicken Only to Lose the Rice, Casually Knocking into the Dragon Melting Realm_3

“When the body of a demi-saint filled with Chong Ling was found, their position was gone, a smile still on their face, with no signs of shock, caution, or vigilance visible… Of course, this is just a rumor and not very credible.”

“But the fact that Lord Shou was able to withstand Nian’s strike indicates that your basic passive defenses are higher than Nian’s ultimate fatal move, this…”

Li Fugui clicked his tongue twice, unsure of what expression to wear.

This is simply too absurd!

Any person, even if they are on guard against Nian in advance, as long as she gets close…

No matter how fast their reactions are, they’d have to face her move up close.

This move is called “Guaranteed Hit”!

Even Bazhun’an would leave with a scar on their neck, and could even have their head chopped off on the spot.

Whether they die or not is another matter; most likely, it would be goodbye to the Ran Ming ruins.

It can be said that the ambush and assassination arranged by Dao Qiongcang or Yue Gongli were absolutely capable of getting rid of a troublesome opponent in the ruins that they themselves coudn’t handle or didn’t want to face.

This is like pulling the rug out from under someone!

But Lord Shou…

Well, that’s outrageous.

Not even his passive defenses were broken through.

Upon hearing Li Fugui’s words, the second true body understood why even the true body couldn’t react in time.

It has nothing to do with battle consciousness; the Memory Returning Dagger is made for killers, and its ability is tremendously strong!

“With such a tricky ability, shouldn’t it be classified among the Great Psionic Weapons?” the second true body expressed its incomprehension.

Li Fugui shook his head: “The nine supreme divine weapons represent the ultimate in a certain ability, and the Memory Returning Dagger exemplifies the power of spiritual will manipulation, engulfing thoughts and memories, which might just be one of its capabilities…”

So the essence is to disturb a person’s mental thinking… The second true body seemed contemplative and soon asked, “Is there anything else worth noting about Nian?”

“Yes!”

Li Fugui nodded: “After Nian washed her hands of the Golden Basin and joined the Holy Divine Palace, with her ability and the characteristics of the Memory Returning Dagger, it’s highly likely that the Holy Divine Palace will grant her the Power of Divinity, enhancing the success rate of ‘One Strike Kill’.”

This was actually just Li Fugui’s guess.

But it was not far from the truth; if he were Hallmaster Dao, with such a useful dagger, there’s no reason not to give some benefits.

He would do so himself, and considering Dao Qiongcang’s mindset…

Not to mention the power of the ancestral source, he probably wished he could turn her into Heavenly Mechanism Puppet No. 3, completely remodeling her physique to better match the Memory Returning Dagger.

A semi-saint person can only hold one, but if it were possible to carry several more, Dao Qiongcang would likely arrange at least ten for her.

As long as, this dagger is controllable!

This was exactly what shocked Li Fugui—the Memory Returning Dagger combined with the power of the ancestral source, and still unable to make Lord Shou leave the Ran Ming ruins…

“There is indeed the Power of Divinity,” the second true body nodded slightly, “Anything else?”

“Yes!” Li Fugui nodded again:

“I’m not clear on her abilities, but I’m very familiar with the methods of killers, especially Nian’s.”

“If the first strike doesn’t succeed, she will surely escape far away!”

“Since her strongest strike couldn’t be fatal, she definitely wouldn’t stay put; she would leave the area far behind you.”

“I don’t know which escape techniques she uses, but at the very moment you asked me, she must have already left the scene. If you’re thinking about revenge, I’m afraid…”

“No,” the second true body’s lips curled slightly.

Li Fugui, hearing this decisive tone, was taken aback for a moment, then quickly reacted with regret: “Even if the flow of time is different between the Apricot Realm and the outside world, after our long talk, she would have already…”

“No!”

Li Fugui stopped abruptly, looking puzzled: “Are you so confident, Lord Shou?”

The second true body grinned with a smile that was somewhat sinister and malicious:

“I’ve already called you over.”

“Never underestimate the vengeance of a petty person, especially after they’ve had their moment of triumph.”

…

Divine Relics.

A moment is an eternity.

Even if Yue Gongli managed to break free from that strange restriction in an extremely short time.

After regaining his senses, he discovered the world had fallen into stillness.

He could move.

Xu Xiaoshou could move.

The people around, not one could move!

“Power of time…”

Yue Gongli’s eyes flashed with a cold light, and when he looked again, he saw Xu Xiaoshou holding a scepter in his hand.

A flash of insight crossed his mind, and as someone with an extraordinary background, he immediately knew what it was.

One of the Great Psionic Weapons, the Time Ancestor Shadow Staff!

“Run… Break—”

The word “run,” forced into “break” by Yue Gongli at the crucial moment!

He clearly saw the killing intent in Xu Xiaoshou’s eyes at that moment.

The Memory Returning Dagger didn’t send him away.

This beast, on the contrary, was provoked?

“`

The only consolation was that Xu Xiaoshou definitely did not yet know of Yi’s existence. As long as Yi remained hidden, there was no need to fight him now. She could be strengthened later, and repeat the assassination attempt a few more times…

“Liu Yue Mirror, break!”

As she thought, Yue Gongli made a seal with her fingers, and the cold Yin energy crept forward with time, contaminating and altering the very rules of time wherever it passed.

The Sky-covering moon appeared, illuminating and penetrating the bitter cold.

The power of time owned by Xu Xiaoshou was borrowed and couldn’t withstand a single blow.

Once the power of the Time Ancestor Shadow Staff was discovered and broken, everyone who had been immobilized could now move again, yet they shivered collectively, feeling as if their souls had been frozen…

No!

It wasn’t “ice.”

There was a sensation of thoughts gradually stiffening, bodies slowly cracking, as if being forcibly twisted from a being of the living world into that of the Underworld.

But the Liu Yue Mirror was not targeted at them. After a collective shiver, everyone realized a great battle was imminent, and they started to flee.

“Run, a holy battle!”

“Damn, they’re fighting just like that?”

“They’ve been hiding for so long, why did they start fighting as soon as Lord Shou arrived, with just a few God Fated Stars?”

“Just a few? Then I can only say you are short-sighted…”

Yue Gongli had no openings at all, not even bothering to glance at anyone in the pursuing army; she kept her gaze fixed solely on Xu Xiaoshou, her lips suddenly curling up:

“Hey, kiddo, actually, Bazhun’an…”

The conversation was barely starting.

Thud!

Everyone’s hearts pounded at once.

The ground around them suddenly sank.

Invisible ripples fell from the sky, smashing the layers of space, more daunting than Saint pressure!

Yue Gongli was caught off guard, her knees buckled, and she nearly knelt on the spot.

As a demi-saint, she could barely withstand it; everyone else fared even worse, nearly all of them being blasted into the ground by the inexplicable force.

Some were even shattered on the spot, turned to stardust and banished…

“Penetrating Divine Senses?”

Yue Gongli’s eyes widened in shock.

Without a doubt, this was the power of the Penetrating Divine Senses; she had studied it for too long.

But…

Yue Gongli stared blankly at Xu Xiaoshou opposite her, who faced her with a cold expression!

How could those Penetrating Divine Senses, integrating into the pressure, shaping the intangible into tangible, and descending from heaven to suppress, flow from his eyes?

“This kind of oppressive sensation…”

For a moment, Yue Gongli felt as if she wasn’t looking at Xu Xiaoshou, but at an Ultimate Giant that blocked out the sky!

Was he that strong?

An ominous premonition had just passed through her mind when…

The black-clad figure opposite her, who had flattened everyone in an instant, slowly raised his hand:

“Who gave you the courage, with just a Memory Returning Dagger, to dare to assassinate me?”

“And who gave you the confidence to think that you could retreat from me unscathed after a failed attack?”

Yue Gongli’s pupils contracted.

Impossible!

The Memory Returning Dagger had hit its mark—how could he know?

A demi-saint’s demi-saint incarnation could be deluded—how could he know?

“Wait…”

Before she could speak.

Xu Xiaoshou brought his fingers together and lifted them slightly.

“Dragon Melting Realm.”

Pfft!

Ten thousand li of white flame erupted, engulfing half the Dark Forest and enveloping all the people in the area, leaving none behind, completely confined.

“We can talk!”

Yue Gongli still wanted to struggle.

Xu Xiaoshou’s eyes were cold and indifferent; he tapped the void gently with his knuckles.

“Exile.”

Crack!

The vast Dragon Melting Realm shifted half a foot to the side.

Whoosh…

All those who had been battered into the underground by the oppressive-type Penetrating Divine Senses felt the gravity of this part of space disappear.

Everyone panicked, flailing their arms and legs.

They were taking flight!

“`
